website_summaries.verdict: Although it might not be the cheapest option out there, this kibble is of high quality and works out quite affordable pound-for-pound.
pros: We love that it's free from all animal products, as well as wheat, gluten, corn, and soy
Contains taurine and l-carnitine, which some vegetarian dog foods lack, but are very important for heart health
cons: The pieces are quite hard, which could be an issue for very small or senior dogs

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs with allergies..
customer_reviews.text: While I won't say it's a miracle cure, my bulldog Buster is the healthiest he has ever been since switching to V-dog dog food. He has horrible allergies to EVERYTHING. Including HUMAN DANDER. My dog is literally allergic to humans. His outbreaks look like huge raw, bloody scabs with bald patches. He was previously taking 5 different medications as well as getting antigen shots weekly (insanely expensive). 5 months after switching to v-dog, he is completely off all 5 meds and is only getting weekly antigen shots. Not to mention, he absolutely loves the food. And he's picky. Great product. Better for his health and the environment AND I'm saving thousands in vet bills. Win.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GO VEGAN if you want your pup to live happy and healthy
customer_reviews.text: My dog Loves it and has Never been healthier. The vet recently stated that he has never seen a healthier dog in his clinic. When I told him my dog is Vegan, he proceeded to tell me how dangerous and unhealthy a vegan diet is for dogs haha. He can believe what he believes, but I know that my dog's health has improved greatly, and she loves vegan food too. I usually add some lentils, peas, and carrots, and brocolli, and her bowel movements are always perfect with no constipation. I tried giving fish a couple times since she went vegan, which was always followed by diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Duranimal

customer_reviews.title: Health first
customer_reviews.text: My Dog had chronic ear infections, skin irritations, and was always itchy, and could not digest anything. This is our 10th food try. The vet tried to tell me to buy this and use this medication. I became fed up and I dont believe in over medicating people or dogs. I did my research and well....10th times charm. He suffers no more from all the ailments listed above. I just want to hug the person that made a vegan kibble available. Thank you with all our hearts.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Usually good, but not this one bag.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Vdog for awhile now. However there is something wrong with this bag. Many of the kibble are discolored and the kibble smells rancid. My dog keeps trying to eat it and walks away after a bite. Wonder if anyone else has had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Willow Lovey

customer_reviews.title: Had to take them off it
customer_reviews.text: I transitioned my dogs to a 100% vegan diet, homemade and with a little V-dog. One dog flourished, unfortunately one redeveloped yeast overload (which he had experienced earlier in life but we had gotten him over it) which for him involved ear infections and severe itching. This particular dog just can't have starches which doesn't work with a canine vegan diet. I still support it since I'm vegan, but doesn't work for all. Original Review: My dogs are not exclusively on vegan diet. They get a handful of this for a 'bedtime snack'. They love it, and it has stopped the bouts of morning vomiting that my 12 Westie has had on and off his whole life.
customer_reviews.author: Once BurnedTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I ship this all the way to Hawaii for my dog friends!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was very apprehensive about buying this for our 2 dogs. (1 is a purebred Rottie who we bought before going vegan and the other is a rescue mix). They both LOVE it and actually the rescue dog HATED dog food that had animal products. She would turn her nose and also suffers from allergic reactions (skin rashes). Since he V-Dog she hasn't had any rashes and they don't get as many fleas! Sometimes I put in leftover cooked beans and/or rice and sweet potatoes into the mix and it works great! They are energetic, happy, healthy, lean and strong. I get this shipped to Hawaii on subscription so I never run out!
customer_reviews.author: HawaiiSandWitch

customer_reviews.title: Dogs actually eat it better than the Merrick they were on
customer_reviews.text: Dogs actually eat it better than the Merrick they were on. No greasy feeling when you touch it. Check out not only how animals are slaughtered for food but how dog food is made. That alone should convert you to this food. Dogs need meat, so how can they eat this, right? Before you slam me, do some research. You're welcome!
customer_reviews.author: aruba

customer_reviews.title: I honestly can not say enough great stuff about this food
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can not say enough great stuff about this food. I have noticed great improvement in my dogs. More energy, they play more. Also I have a pug and his eyes always tear up he always had huge stains around his eyes and down his chin. Nothing worked. The stains were impossible to clean, no matter what I used, I thought they were permanent until I put my dogs on Vdog. Within a few months his eyes cleared out!!! They still tear up and his face might get dirty, but not stained. I am amazed by this food. I am very happy that it works for my dogs. Just look at the photos!
customer_reviews.author: Regina FalangeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Caused enlarged heart/cardiomyopathy in my dog
customer_reviews.text: I fed my dog Vdog for 4 straight years and the cardiologist treating my dog for an enlarged heart/heart disease told me this diet is what caused it. In trying to save the planet I broke my dogs heart, and mine too. Update: My dog passed away yesterday from heart failure. She was 7 years old. She should've lived another 10 years based on her genetics. Pea protein, legumes, and potatoes weaken a dog's heart. Unfortunately we're learning this through trial and error because we don't put effort into properly studying nutrition. For humans or animals. Consult your veterinarian before feeding this to your pup. I wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: daniel foste

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality food,  your pups will feel great.
customer_reviews.text: Best food I have ever used. I also love that it is animal and cruelty free. I have two elderly special needs dogs. One has dementia and the other has arthritis. Both have improved significantly being on this food. It smells great even To me. I get hungry every time I open the dog food container. Lol. I know I am doing what's best for my furry family as well as the planet. I have watched too many dogs die of cancer over the years from a poor quality meat based diet. I'm just sorry options like this weren't available years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Sidewinder7

customer_reviews.title: Cardiomyopathy as a result?
customer_reviews.text: After three years of using this, my vet just said it may have lead him to get Cardiomyopathy even though his breed isn’t prone to it. They are just learning about these boutique dog food and grain free ones but BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gehring

customer_reviews.title: My dogs did not.like it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs did not like it 😢 I so disapointed I try mixing the seeds with everything and still nothing they just eat eventhing except the seeds now i have a full bag that i dont want it to go in the trash 😞. Any suggestion on how to make my dogs eat this food?
customer_reviews.author: MIR3LLA02

customer_reviews.title: Meal time
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Love knowing that my dog is finally eating healthy. My 100 pound Rottweiler loves the food. She has more energy than ever. I notice that her allergies and her autoimmune disorders are going away. The only problem is you have to remember that it’s vegan. As human vegans are always hungry do to not having any animal product sitting heavy in our stomachs goes the same way for dogs. So I make sure to also feed her a cup for lunch. Before on her animal product It was just 2 cups am and pm but on this food it’s 2 am 1 lunch and 2 dinner.
customer_reviews.author: rie

customer_reviews.title: Vegan Diet is Best for Dogs and V-Dog Makes That Possible for ALL
customer_reviews.text: We do make our own whole foods plant-based dog food for our two shiny, vegan pugs; however, we supplement with V-Dog because they love the crunch and we love the ingredients. We know dozens of families who love this dog food and for good reason! The ingredients are clean, well-balanced, and all dogs seem to love it! Best vegan/vegetarian food on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Plant

customer_reviews.title: MY DOG LOVES THIS FOOD!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY!!! I bought this for my dog last week as they discontinued his food prior. I am vegan, so I felt it would only be right if my dog was too. I read so many great reviews on this product, and they are all true! Usually, I have to transition my dog slowly to another food as he is VERY picky with a sensitive stomach, but he went right in on this stuff. He absolutely loves it, no belly aches or diarrhea, and did not have to transition from his old food. I will never buy any other dog food.
customer_reviews.author: The Griffins

customer_reviews.title: Five Times the Love!
customer_reviews.text: We have five, high-energy, fun, lovable and loving, adopted pups in our family who are thriving on their vegan diet. They're healthy, happy, and totally satisfied. V-DOG is a HUGE part of that! It's a crucial piece of our family's part toward living cruelty-free and trying to help keep Earth good for countless generations to come. I love their plant-based offerings and dig that their company is a family-owned operation with vegans paving the way for more plant-based options for dogs--and according to my pups, they're doing it deliciously so! As they say at V-DOG and we agree: "For Pooch and Planet." :)
customer_reviews.author: Dogmama

customer_reviews.title: Pitbull approved!
customer_reviews.text: My 80lb. pitbull has severe food allergies as an albino. This food saved his life some 7 years ago and he is as healthy as ever! We regularly go for 5k+ hikes, his coat and skin are healthy, and he no longer experiences diarrhea, pink skin, chewing, or massive food anxiety. Our vet was skeptical of a vegan dog food but after reading that it is AAFCO approved as nutritionally complete - all skepticism disappeared! We tried every Rx, wholistic, and homemade option out there before making the switch. I don't know what we'd do without V-Dog! <3
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: The vet is happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food and is responding very well to it. This is our fourth bag. I have noticed that my 9 yr old dog has much more energy now. She was overweight and lost 5 pounds without sweating it out. The vet is happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Yum Yum!
customer_reviews.text: So far my Senior pup loves this food. She's been eating it for about a week. I switched her from Honest Kitchen because it just was not filling enough since it's a powder you rehydrate. I was very nervous about doing this because she's very food sensitive & any time I've tried to change her food in the past she would experience uncontrollable diarrhea & no one would get any sleep for days because it would always be worse at night! This however appears to have actually improved her digestion!
customer_reviews.author: SweetPeaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Glad she liked it, because we bought a 30-pound bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: We rolled the dice, and bought the big bag without our 9-year chihuahua trying it out first. I was impressed by the review where one person said their dog ate around other food to get at the V-Dog. My wife was hooked by the idea that we'd hopefully have a lot less shedding based on the experience of others. It's only been a few days now, so can't tell about the shedding yet....or if we can stop giving her the hip and joint treats we give her.....but she loved the V-Dog right away. If the results end up as positive as others have experienced, my wife has suggested she may start feeding this to me as well. :-)
customer_reviews.author: dougzed

customer_reviews.title: Been getting Wysong Vegan Dry Dog instead with better results.
customer_reviews.text: Gives my lab diarrhea and gas unfortunately. He's not that sensitive to most things, but have tried this multiple times and it isn't working for him. Really wanted for this to be our food. Been getting Wysong Vegan Dry Dog instead with better results.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun P.

customer_reviews.title: Two paws up!!
customer_reviews.text: I am super thrilled with such a quality vegan dog food option for my sweet boy Mr. Henry (a golden retriever with allergies) he loves this kibble and gobbles it up... All this after being used to having canned dog food mixed with his kibble everyday, I didn't think he'd be happy about the switch. We also feed this to my husband's dog who has kidney failure and needs a lower protein diet then the meat filled ones and he is doing very well! This is quite spendy when feeding two large dogs so to help I have made a vegan homemade food that gets mixed with this kibble and the boys love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jos88

customer_reviews.title: Happy and Healthy Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs all love V-dog. It has stopped any allergies and stomach problems. People can not believe how young they look and act. Even my vet thought my french bulldog was 3 but he is 12 and perky as ever and they have been on V-dog for over 5 years. They had problems before but when I switched the problems all went away. Why would you kill an animal to feed an animal. It makes no sense when they can be way healthier with plant based food.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Breslow

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs prefer V-Dog vegetarian to Origen meat kibble
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs get mixed food: Origen puppy food (dark brown) and V-Dog vegetarian kibble (light brown). See my photo. The dark brown meat kibble is always dropped left on the floor by them (they never let the V-Dog ones hit the floor) and they also pick the vegetarian kibble out of the meat kibble, as you can see in this photo of their feeder. They still eat both kibbles, but prefer vegetarian.
customer_reviews.author: EveryoneIsAnotherYou

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like this - I’m vegan and my dog was having issues with her shedding which I hoped this would improve. No dice. It takes dogs tummy’s a while to adjust to a new food but unfortunately my girl never adjusted. Her poop was runny and it never got better after 3 weeks. Had to throw out the rest of the bag. Disappointing V dog doesn’t have smaller bags. From a review posted here someone suggest Halo brand and that is working great for us! My dog loves it and it works for her tummy.
customer_reviews.author: artsyfartsy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about this big bag of dog food making other dogs have bad gas and diarreha, but I thought surely the seller had changed the dog food out. NOPE, MY DOG IS SICK and now this food is mixed in with my other 30lbs of food!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Hall

customer_reviews.title: Happy, healthy, well-fed dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs are happy and healthy on this food. Our 9-year-old girl has skin allergy issues that have drastically improved since switching to V-Dog. And our 6-year-old boy's gas issues have all but been resolved (his old nickname was "Toot", because, well...). They've been on this food for about a year now and their vet is highly impressed with their blood work! We supplement with some vet-approved veggies, but they are always happy to eat the kibble as-is, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Most meat in dog food is obviously the stuff not good enough to sell to humans. I love this company as it’s run by vegans who will clearly care about how it’s affecting their clients. I mix it with water and a base mix and it’s been great for my Pit who eats more than I can cook. They all love it! Personally I think dogs need fresh snacks too but this is a great staple and I have never had issues over many years.
customer_reviews.author: N M

customer_reviews.title: Great food, been using for a year now.
customer_reviews.text: My three dogs love this food. All skin allergies my English setter had are now gone. She’s also put on weight which I’ve tried to make happen for years now. It’s also helped my previously overweight chow mix lose weight. I love having found a food that’s healthy for them and also doesn’t put a damper on our already dying environment.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi kimbro

customer_reviews.title: Dog's are happy and more energetic
customer_reviews.text: My dog's both like this food. The bag smells of veggies when opened up. I'd say stock up in the winter, Springtime so that food is not stored and transported on hot trucks across the country and local delivery vans just to be safe with this or any other quality food/supplement/cosmetic product for animals or yourself. I did a slow change from previous food to this one and now I do add a little organic pumpkin for one of my dog's stool. The other is just fine without the pumpkin but it's good for them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Barry

customer_reviews.title: BEST VEGAN DOGFOOD I HAVE EVER TRIED.  TRUST ME ---  WORTH EVERY PENNY FOLKS!
customer_reviews.text: Over the past year I've been trying to get my dogs to be vegan like me, until now. The problem was really dry looking kibble with no smell and my 5 dogs wouldn't touch it. On top of that, the real test was that their stool was very runny... All of them! With a product like V-DOG, their stool is firm like it is on Wellness CORE that they've been on for a couple years, but they're not gaining weight and little things like cloudy eye snot isn't as cloudy. I just feel better with this food. We're hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Orros

customer_reviews.title: Who knew?!
customer_reviews.text: Well who knew my dog would love this food. I am thrilled. He was not a dry dog food eater but I put just a little hot water on this and he loves it. I just wish since my guy is l8 lbs that it would come in smaller sizes....and apparently the company is considering offering a smaller size for sale. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Best food for allergies
customer_reviews.text: Best food ever! I have a blue Merle chihuahua and she has allergies. We couldn’t pinpoint what they were but now we don’t have too. Her coat, skin and breathe are healthier and shinier than they have been in her entire life. She also has more energy than she did before eating this food. She tends to be a picky eater and will eat this food right up every time. So glad I found this food!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: For a happy, healthy, cruelty-free pup!
customer_reviews.text: We feed this to both of our dogs (a border collie mix and a lab mix) and they absolutely love it. Our border collie was experiencing a lot of digestive trouble with foods with meat (particularly beef) and switching him over to V-dog cleared up all of his problems immediately! No more diarrhea, terrible gas, or tummy aches! And for anyone wondering about his health, he has been on it for about a year and recently got blood work back that confirmed he is in excellent health! He is on a completely vegan diet, largely consuming V-dog, and his vet said he is in great shape! Highly recommend this cruelty free alternative to traditional dog food!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of energy
customer_reviews.text: I transitioned my 3 senior pups to V-dog kibble a couple weeks ago hoping to combat allergies (and try out vegan food for my pups vs other allergy friendly options). My 9 year old Lhasa Apso has since been asking to go out in the yard daily to run laps by herself. She's not playing with another dog or chasing a squirrel. She's just getting her laps in. I see a gray blur running by out of the corner of my eye every few seconds. No energy issues here! Hoping the allergies will go away with time!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Happy Healty Vegan Dog Food!
customer_reviews.text: My little guys took to V-Dog perfectly! And I gave it to my Mom for her dog to try and he loved it too! I am a Vegan and I wanted my babies to try out this food, because of my ethical convictions, they loved it so much and I am happy to say we are a little happy healthy cruelty free family! Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: A vegan Pitbull
customer_reviews.text: I just can’t believe how much my dog love this food. She can’t get enough. I combine this food with another one to make it last because it is Kind of expensive! However it is kind of hard to make it last long because my dog just loves it so much. Also she used to have digestive issues and since I started feeding her V-dog they are gone. I would give it 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: MariC

customer_reviews.title: Cruelty free and our dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent dog food! Both of our dogs love it and are doing great after a year... better skin for our sensitive dog and our other liked it so much she gained a few pounds (be careful with how much you feed, your dog will not starve). Our dogs are thriving on this cruelty-free food, confirmed by healthy checkups at our vet! Our vet thinks it is great and has recommended we keep them on it since they are doing so well.
customer_reviews.author: beecee

customer_reviews.title: Great first batch. Disappointing second batch.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what changed with this brand. My dog loved the first bag and did well with it. The second bag was repulsive to her. We ended up throwing it out.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline D. Grimm

customer_reviews.title: its a kibble and a good one.
customer_reviews.text: with all the bad press coming out on the kibble pet food industry I have been avoiding offering my dog kibble. He has been on raw food since day one ... almost. I've heard nothing but good about v-dog. I think it is probably the best out there. having said that my dog is not inspired by it ... yet. and I prefer to feed him a raw fresh diet. there are just times in my life when I am not able to do the kitchen thing. I'm hopeful he will begin to enjoy this. time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: Bag arrived ripped open - twice!
customer_reviews.text: I've used V-dog for many years and it's a great food. Unfortunately the last bag I ordered arrived damaged - it was ripped open. It looks like someone tried to tape it, but the rip extended beyond the tape. Amazon sent me a second bag, which also arrived ripped. I'm not quite sure what to do at this point. It seems like the packaging isn't holding up. My dog has always been happy with her V-dog food, but I have no idea how long these bags have been sitting in the warehouse like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i asked to cancel this subscription!
customer_reviews.text: my dogs did not like it; it did not help with their constant itching; and i was told this monthly shipping was cancelled yet it still shipped and set to ship for the next year! wth?!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Reneau

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love the food..... packing needs to be better bag broke open during shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I went vegan and my dogs followed my lead. Grover my 15 year old Dachshund mix his health improved and his seizures stopped. My other Dachshund mix loves the food. Both dogs poop without straining all is much better on this food I took a star off for packing....the bag broke open two shipments in a row
customer_reviews.author: Here Gromit a censored Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: A must for your pup !
customer_reviews.text: My dog has never been picky so She loves it, we just adopted our second pup from the shelter and she goes crazy for it ! My little girl has hip problems but I’ve noticed a big difference with this food and her acid reflexe as well. I’ll add calendula herbal tea for added anti inflammatory and oral health, I’ve never seen pups beg so hard for herbal tea lmao this food is a definite must for all pups out there !
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: I never imagined I'd have a vegan dog
customer_reviews.text: My pitbull is the pickiest eater ever, and I never thought I would put him on a vegan diet. But as he's gotten older, he has started having health problems so I thought I would try something new. He LOVES the flavor and has put on weight since switching to this food. His energy is back up, and his bathroom habits are super healthy now! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sunny O.

customer_reviews.title: Great kibble for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. He is vegan and I tried other brands of plant based kibble, and while he eats those, he doesn’t have that devour it all attitude :) like he does with vdog. I also buy dehydrated vegan mix, plus give him lots of cooked meals in addition to fresh veggies and ocassional fruits . However, vdog kibble has everything he needs, but just like with human food, you want to eat fresh and organic ingredients first, processed on the side. That being said if I don’t have time to prepare a meal, I always have vdog on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Read!

customer_reviews.title: Birdie loves V Dog
customer_reviews.text: Birdie has been eating V Dog kibble for over 2 months now. I decided to switch her from some grocery store grain-free kibble to V Dog, with the hopes that her skin would clear up. On the old grain-free food, she was itchy and scratching ALL the time. She also had a patch of dry scaly skin in one of her ears, and a lot of dandruff. All of her skin problems have gone away with the switch to V dog, and she seems happy. I don't speak dog (yet) but I'm sure she's grateful I made the switch for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: V-Dog dry food
customer_reviews.text: My Shi Tzu pup is vegan!!! He eats a daily sweet potato, tomatoes and his V-Dog kibbles and he is healthy and strong and handsome. My other pup was 17 years a vegan and she enjoyed this kibble also! I guess they love it and I guess it speaks for itself. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these treats, super healthy no more allergies, healthy vegan dog 4eva!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats, she gets crazy when she hears the bag. No more allergies or bold spots. My dog is healthier since she is vegan. She needs protein not dead ass meal with cancer and who knows what. Vegan dogs rules, vegan humans rules. Save the earth, go vegan!
customer_reviews.author: Lomo

customer_reviews.title: 2 happy dachshunds!
customer_reviews.text: Both of our dogs have been vegan for 1 year now. We add water to the dish so that they have added moisture for when they defecate. Great reduction in back pain and allergies. My dog no longer needs back pain medicine!!so yes the regular dog food creates problems for his old back, he is 15 years old and the other one is 13. Both healthy and highly active on our runs in the park.
customer_reviews.author: Lorry

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying this dog food, and just ordered a second bag. My dogs love it, the food actually smells appealing. I have a 90 lb dog and a 14 lb dog, for the little one I heat up some veggie juice and pour it on to soften it up, since I don’t think they have small kibble size. Works great and my dogs love the juice. This is our go to dog food for now!
customer_reviews.author: Jen B

customer_reviews.title: No more doggy runs
customer_reviews.text: My dog used to have random diarrhea from a large variety of expensive dog foods I used to buy him. I got tired of seeing him sick. I figured it was a lack of regulation and temperature control with meat products so I decided to try a meat free option. It worked. 6+ months now of living on Vdog and he has not had a single bout of diarrhea. He's also stopped licking his feet and his skin and fur are looking much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Helped with skin allergies
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is vegan. I have two dogs with skin allergies and used to have to take prescription allergy medicine. This food worked well for one of my dogs. She no longer needs her medication. Unfortunately this food did not work for my other dog. I wish the kibble was a little smaller because I have small breed dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: and so far they seem to like it! Maybe if they make a version with ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been vegetarian for 10 years & buying even pescatarian dog food never quite sits right with me, so I was really excited to finally try a vegan brand. Unfortunately, my dogs are very picky eaters and wouldn't touch it. I tried mixing in some hot water to soften in, and breaking the kibble up into smaller pieces (they're small dogs & the kibble is larger than they're used to) but nothing worked. I gifted the bag to my friend whose pitbull has skin & joint issues, and so far they seem to like it! Maybe if they make a version with smaller kibble i'll try again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our pets count on us for healthy lives
customer_reviews.text: I am into my third 20 lb bag of V-Dog for my boy Woody. I started slow one meal a day for a week. He had no problem gobbling it up.I realize making your pet Vegan is quite a step but I have seen signs of better health already. Eye buggers have stopped, his coat is softer and shinier and his poop is very regular and consistently solid. So I know there are no pesticides or other unwanted additives in his food because it's organic. Being Plant based his food's nutrients are much more easily absorbed. He loves it! And it's almost half the cost of the premium brands.
customer_reviews.author: jerry b

customer_reviews.title: Please make for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this product as I am an ethical vegan myself and because of the high quality ingredients. However my dog doesn’t have a taste for this and I think it’s because the individual kibble size is too big for her (she is 13 lbs) and the kibbles are too hard. I’d buy again if you made this for smaller dogs with a smaller kibble size.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: CHANGE IS GOOD
customer_reviews.text: It’s truly amazing to see the transition our dog went through, having him on V dog food is a blessing. it’s amazing how you will see there system clean out any toxins from all regular food he’s eaten in the past. He’s poop has become consist without complications with constipation or Diarrhea. He’s a healthy dog today because of a choice we made to go plant based, with an open mind that if his system didn’t handle it we knew we could always change. I’m grateful it has all worked out and not only for my dog but a few people I recommend to give it a try and they too have had success and never went back again.
customer_reviews.author: SunQueen

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs with allergies
customer_reviews.text: My dog has allergies and this food has been the best for her itchiness. We have never been able to figure out what she is allergic too, but whatever it is, it's not in VDog. She has been on this diet for over a year. Also, I love supporting this brand because I am vegetarian.
customer_reviews.author: Chaun C Chambers

customer_reviews.title: My girls love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My two little 14 year old chihuahuas love this food! When used other food I had to change it all the time, they never ate anything consistently. This they love, every meal and they can not wait to eat it again and again. And..... bonus.... they are getting healthier and healthier!!!!!! So happy I had them become vegans like me!!!! I only wish I had switched them to it sooner!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed - will continue to buy but wish price was better
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic - one of my dogs immediately loved it, the other took a couple days but now they both eat it. I love that the ingredients are both high-quality and plant-based, and provide the dogs with the nutrients and proteins their bodies need. Regarding price, I understand that for economies of scale reasons they may not be able to do lower, but they should keep in mind that doing so would give them access to more customers, which in turn results in more people making the healthy/ethical/sustainable choice.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Bag busted, kibble everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I got my package on time. But when I picked up the bag out of the box the bottom busted open and I had kibble overing the floor. I recovered most of it. The good news is my Schnauzer seems to be in love with it. I couldn't get it up fast enough to keep her from eating. So she had a early meal and probably more than she should have had
customer_reviews.author: Diane McMichael

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely best dog food ever, used to buy of CHEWY but discovered Amazon carries it.. my dogs love this not only because my dogs are fully vegan but that VDOG eliminates their allergies
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Simply great dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. Daily member of the clean plate (bowl?) club, and she's never been more regular or had healthier poops. She's never had loose stools with it. It's also much healthier for her than other dog foods that contain animal products and better for the planet. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Tired Fellow

customer_reviews.title: Kibble is WAY too big!
customer_reviews.text: Meh. My dog does not like this dog food, and WHY oh why are the kibbles so big?? There are medium and small dogs out there too, you know! I have to wet this food down in order to make it palatable and swallow-able. Please reconsider the size and add some liquid smoke or something (nutritional yeast) in increase flavor profile.
customer_reviews.author: Leena C.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: My 15lb Yorkie (2yrs old) has been on this food for about a year and is happy and healthy! He's SUPER active and has TONS of energy too. I love that I'm able to feel good about my moral decisions when buying food for my pup.
customer_reviews.author: fat tony

customer_reviews.title: Chow Chow prefers this...
customer_reviews.text: I was worried because my chow chow is a super picky eater. We are switching over from Nulo. I mixed both kibbles together and she picked all of the v dog out to eat and left the Nulo. This has been a daily thing for a week now. Guess she prefers this!
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Meno

customer_reviews.title: So happy
customer_reviews.text: My 2 75lbs dogs love this kibble! As a 80/20 vegan/vegetarian myself, I have struggled to reconcile the meat I used to feed my dogs. I am so happy to find this food and I'm so happy that they enjoy it and are thriving on it.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Great quality dog food. We have a 2 year old Dachshund who originally started out on non vegan dogfood but transitioned to V-dog and is thriving. No smelly gas or GI upset. A little pricey but well worth it
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Dog with allergies.. works great.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t speak on the flavor lol but my dog loves it! He is allergic to meat. I know, right. This doesn’t cause any side effects whatsoever. He’s been on it about 6 months now, and it’s still going good!
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Out dogs love meal time
customer_reviews.text: Our V-Dogs have no complaints when it comes to meal time. We feel good about what we are feeding them. We have a large male golden retriever and a husky mix and both are healthy and happy.
customer_reviews.author: Beci

customer_reviews.title: Nearly expired product code-buy from Chewy.com
customer_reviews.text: I love the food. My vet says it has great nutrition. But will not buy it from Amazon again. Product code Best By 3/25/18. I ordererd it on 3/11/18. Bought a bag from Chewy.com to compare. That bag has a BB code of 3/07/19.
customer_reviews.author: Analee H. Perica

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness for V-Dog!
customer_reviews.text: My senior dog has pancreatitis and beginning stage kidney disease, so I needed a food with low to modest protein and low fat. She's doing great on it and loves it! I really appreciate that the bag is compostable and that the company is 100% vegan. The ingredients are non GMO which matters to me. It's a great quality product and much less expensive than similar foods.
customer_reviews.author: Coyote

customer_reviews.title: My dogs are crazy for it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are thriving since I shifted their diet to a plant-based one. Their furs are shining brighter than EVER. Ps: They love V-dog mixed with nutritional yeast and hemp oil
customer_reviews.author: Marcela

customer_reviews.title: Improved dogs health
customer_reviews.text: I have two large dogs who were suffering from stiffness and would have a hard time running and even getting up. Once I started them on this food, their stiffness went away and they even got some of their old energy back! love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: No more bloody poop!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing food for my dog that I adopted. He had blood in his stool for so long and we switched to so many brands out there it was ridiculous. Finally I remember I switched my diet to vegan because I had stomach issues and it worked for me.. so I did it with my dog and it worked for him too! We love it and especially love that it ships to Hawaii!
customer_reviews.author: Leyra

customer_reviews.title: Veterinarian approved and Caleb likes it!
customer_reviews.text: I ran the ingredient list by my veterinarian and was very excited to learn that the omegas that normally need to be supplemented once your pet is on a vegan diet are added into this food. Caleb, my Yorkie loved the food on its own at first but since he is a picky eater, I have been adding nutritional yeast (a vegan staple) or peanut butter to enhance the flavor for him. Sometimes I will add some fruit or veggies from my plate. I have been subscribing to this food for a while but I hope other flavors can be integrated.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Choose life! Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our two rescued terrier mixes are extremely happy with this food. They like it wet or dry, too. Their coats are shiny, they're full of energy, and the vet says they're in perfect health. We'll never go back to contributing to misery, death, disease, and climate change again!
customer_reviews.author: Gladerunner

customer_reviews.title: Gives the Full Nutritional Profile dogs need - and they love it!
customer_reviews.text: What a great way to reduce our carbon footprint and our cruelty footprint on this world and it's animals. This food is awesome as it provides the full nutrient profile which dogs require, but does so from plant source. And the dogs love it and don't know the difference! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Robin L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Dog LOVES and I love for her!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality food. Your dog can and will get all the nutrients they need from this food - no gross animal/fake animal additives required. All fresh and natural ingredients you will not find this from another brand. Dog is happy and healthy and been on this food for about 6 mo now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: My two small dogs were on vegetarian Natural Balance for a long time but one dog always had digestive issues with it that progressively worsened. I recently switched to Vdog and wish I'd switched so much sooner! My dogs like it much more, it is much gentler on my sensitive pup's tummy, and I'm happy to support a vegan company. Five stars! But Amazon, could you please also carry the small dog kibble size?
customer_reviews.author: tolula

customer_reviews.title: Great vegan dog food!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs has severe allergies and has to be on a vegan formula, this is the more expensive of the 2 available brands but it’s worth the price and my dogs happily ate it.
customer_reviews.author: amemley

customer_reviews.title: He likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has a small liver so he cant have a lot of animal protein. He has been eating Halo but its so expensive. We tried natural balance vegan but he wouldnt eat it. This food costs less than halo but he likes it just as much!
customer_reviews.author: Jarbells

customer_reviews.title: A true vegan doggie dish!
customer_reviews.text: Great food for dogs with allergies... just wish the price was a bit more reasonable. My dog devours his meals!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Green poop!
customer_reviews.text: We keep buying this for our pup. I love supporting vegan companies. My dog seems to like it. I have noticed when he goes, his pop is green but still has a good consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Fabiola

customer_reviews.title: It's been almost 2 years now that we've been ordering V-Dog and are very happy! Not to mention
customer_reviews.text: My dog had to go on a vegetarian diet to reduce her seizures. She actually loves this food and hasn't had a seizure since! It's been almost 2 years now that we've been ordering V-Dog and are very happy! Not to mention, the pack lasts us 3-4 months
customer_reviews.author: clarissa

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth It! My Picky Pup Loves!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many a vegan dog food, including making my own at home, and no other dry food gets the same level of excitement out of my pup that this does. It is a bit pricey, but well worth it in my opinion. I pair it with a spoonful of wet vegan dog food and my dog LOVES it. As long as this remains available, this will be the dry dog food I purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ryann

customer_reviews.title: 5 plus stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3 pups first vegetarian food my pups have had. I be bought two bags so far and my pups love it!! Their coats are shiny and health skin issue for my Bulldog are noticeably gone. Thank you! for making such a great balanced meal.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: My dog was having a bad allergic reaction and my vet said it's mostly a meat that she's allergic to but it would take a lot of money to find out which specific one it is because of testing. I tried taking her off chicken to a beef food, but the rash didn't go away. I was nervous to put her on V Dog but she's been on it for almost 2 months now and she's doing great! No rash and she has super clean non irritated skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it. But I wish there was a smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it. But I wish there was a smaller bag size (not smaller size kibbles), because as much as my dogs like and eat it, one of them needs to rotate between food types a little more often because he's kinda diva and gets tired of the same food quickly. Smaller bag would be awesome. Other than that, dogs like it.
customer_reviews.author: Stamazon

customer_reviews.title: Doggie approved.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the taste and I love the ingredients!! He usually gets sick of food or it makes him ill. He has a sensitive tummy and bad allergies. This stuff has him begging to get fed and he never gets sick!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Pups love this dog food
customer_reviews.text: Feeding this tow 3 older dogs ad 2 pups from rescue. They love it and their coats are shinny and healthy looking. Highly recommend this for all dogs.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: great dog food!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this stuff. I usually microwave a potato, or give the dog some of our vegan human food, along with the V dog kibble. She's a happy dog.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE LUMPS!!
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves V-dog!! We noticed him getting a few lumps on his shoulder and the Vet said he’d need surgery. His breed is known for getting lumps and bumps, but I wasn’t going to accept that as the answer. I took matters into my own hands and switched him to a vegan diet after seeing what drastic changes my boyfriend and I experienced after going vegan.... and his lumps are now gone!!! Also cleared his itchy skin and he seems happy and healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good poo
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was a bit ripped up but the contents wasn't exposed to air. I'm glad to have access to this brand of dog food! Though I wish more stores carried it. Dogs like it and it makes the poo of my dog with a sensitive tummy perfect.
customer_reviews.author: actress

customer_reviews.title: My 4 yr old dachshund loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dachshund was a bit overweight so thought I'd switch her to this, a few months in and can notice a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Tim S

customer_reviews.title: The taste is not so good :(
customer_reviews.text: My dogs don’t like the flavor. My friend ordered it, and her dog wouldn’t eat it either. Finally, I break it down in the blender and mix into a sandy texture, then I add water to make it a paste. That’s how we’re getting through the bag so far.
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Good but please make a smaller kibble option!
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to really like this food. I wish they had an option for smaller kibble though. My dog is only 4 pounds so this is too big for her & I have to crunch it up before giving it to her (especially since she is missing most of her teeth and swallows her food whole).
customer_reviews.author: Amber R

customer_reviews.title: The best...
customer_reviews.text: Our dog won't eat most foods, gets various reactions from many others, and that's among all diets. He loves this food and never lets it sit in the bowl. He also seems to come around and thank us after his meal with a single kiss on whatever exposed skin he can reach. We were skeptical of a vegan kibble for a dog, but not any longer. His health and attitude have improved and we're so grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary S.

customer_reviews.title: Blue heeler approved
customer_reviews.text: I tried my 4 year old blue heeler on the other popular vegan dog food and she wouldn’t touch it, I had to mix it with other dog food so she would eat it. But she is now on her second bag of vdog dog food and eats it all no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Fit and Trim
customer_reviews.text: This product keeps my dog fit and trim. She's 11 years old and going strong. The best thing about this food is that my dog isn't enticed to over eat. My dog had a fatty cyst on her chest that is slowly melting away as I continue to feed her this product.
customer_reviews.author: Querier

product_meta.title: V-Dog Vegan Kibble Dry Dog Food
product_meta.description: Size:20 lbPacking 24% protein, v-dog's kind kibble is formulated by experts in animal nutrition to meet all guidelines for AAFCO adult dog nutrition. V-dog kind kibble contains the perfect balance of essential amino acids, vitamins and minerals your dog needs to thrive, without any corn, soy or wheat, making it excellent for sensitive, itchy and allergy-prone dogs. Here at v-dog, we’re vegans and we love dogs of all shapes, sizes and scruffiness. In fact, we love all animals. . . cows, pigs, chickens, you name it! That's why we're passionate about making a difference through our 100% plant-powered products. Our biggest commitment is to the health of your fur baby and we’ve certainly done our research. Dogs are omnivores and can thrive on a nutritionally-complete, plant-based diet like v-dog. Since we use clean, plant-powered protein and leave out corn, soy and wheat, our products are excellent for sensitive and itchy pups. Plus, a vegan dog, like a vegan human, leaves a much smaller paw print on our planet. Yummy, healthy, cruelty-free dog food? High fives (and paws) all around!
feature_bullets: Contains one 20lb bag of vegan dry dog food
100% plant-based, vegan dog food formulated by experts to meet all AAFCO guidelines for adult dog nutriton
Never Any: Animal Products, Wheat, Corn, Soy, Dairy, Factory Farming, By Products, Fake Stuff, Fillers
Contains all essential amino acids with 24% protein
Pooch Tested & Planet Approved for a smaller environmental pawprint

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
